name: A. Tavas and Nafas
statement:
Today Tavas got his test result as an integer score and he wants to
share it with his girlfriend, Nafas.His phone operating system is
Tavdroid, and its keyboard doesn’t have any digits! He wants to share
his score with Nafas via text, so he has no choice but to send this
number using words. He ate coffee mix without water again, so right now
he’s really messed up and can’t think.Your task is to help him by
telling him what to type.
editorial:
First of all check if is one of the values . Then, let s have array =
{"", "", "twenty", "thirty", , "ninety"} and = {"", "one", , "nine"}.
